tasks.label: Run Admin (Dev)
args: set -a; [ -f .env.local ] && source .env.local; export ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Development; dotnet dev-certs https --trust >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; export ASPNETCORE_URLS=https://localhost:5199; dotnet run --project ./src/Admin.Web
tasks.detail: Loads secrets from .env.local and runs Admin.Web in Development.

tasks.label: Run Admin (Prod)
args: set -a; [ -f .env.local ] && source .env.local; export ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Production; export ASPNETCORE_URLS=https://localhost:5199; dotnet run --project ./src/Admin.Web
tasks.detail: Loads secrets from .env.local and runs Admin.Web in Production.
